Frequently Asked Questions

Career & Availability

I'm seeking entry-level IT internship opportunities, particularly in IT Support, Network Administration, and System Development. I'm open to roles that combine technical skills with problem-solving and customer service.

I'm currently available for internship opportunities and will be graduating in 6 months. I can start immediately and am flexible with work arrangements including remote, hybrid, or on-site positions.

I'm flexible with all work arrangements. I prefer hybrid work environments as they offer the best balance of collaboration and focus, but I'm equally comfortable with fully remote or on-site positions.

Technical Expertise

My strongest technical skills include IT Troubleshooting, Networking, Remote Support, and Multimedia Design. I'm also proficient in Python, web development, and mobile app development with Flutter. I hold Google IT Support and CCNA certifications.

I work with Python (intermediate level), C++ for system development, HTML/CSS/JavaScript for web development, and Dart for Flutter mobile app development. I'm also learning AWS cloud technologies and prompt engineering.

I'm currently learning AWS cloud technologies and working towards AWS Cloud Support Specialist certification. I have foundational knowledge of cloud concepts and am eager to gain hands-on experience with cloud platforms.

Project & Collaboration

I work on diverse projects including web development (landing pages, responsive designs), mobile app development with Flutter, system development with C++, and multimedia design projects. I enjoy both technical and creative challenges.

I follow a systematic approach: first understanding the problem, researching solutions, planning the implementation, and then executing with attention to detail. I believe in learning from each challenge and documenting solutions for future reference.

I prefer collaborative project management with clear communication, defined milestones, and regular check-ins. I value both structured approaches and flexibility to adapt to changing requirements. I'm organized and detail-oriented while maintaining focus on the big picture.
